actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to streamline siting processes for personal wireless service facilities, including small personal wireless service facilities, and for other purposes.
short_title: Winning the International Race for Economic Leadership and Expanding Service to Support Leadership Act

summary.text:
Winning the International Race for Economic Leadership and Expanding Service to Support Leadership Act or the WIRELESS Leadership Act

This bill limits the authority of, and imposes deadlines on, state and local governments regarding decisions about the placement, construction, and modification of personal wireless service facilities.

titles.title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to streamline siting processes for personal wireless service facilities, including small personal wireless service facilities, and for other purposes.
Winning the International Race for Economic Leadership and Expanding Service to Support Leadership Act
